subject: 体型圆润的蓝精灵，圆眼睛，短小身材
detail: Animated style, a plump Smurf with big round eyes and a short stubby body, first viewed from a low angle emphasizing its cute silhouette, then dolly in smoothly to focus on its rosy, chubby cheeks and sparkling, gleaming pupils, next gently pull back to reveal a wide shot of a joyful group of Smurfs gathered atop a misty mountain peak, soft ethereal clouds drifting around them, gentle wind rustling through the air and children’s cheerful laughter echoing in the background. Camera: dolly in, then slow pull-back. Background sound: light breeze and joyful children’s laughter. Voiceover says in Chinese "从前有座山，山上有一群蓝精灵"
image_detail: (动画风格) 青蓝色皮肤的圆润小精灵，环绕在山顶的云雾间，镜头聚焦在它圆鼓鼓的脸蛋和闪闪发亮的瞳孔
narration: 从前有座山，山上有一群蓝精灵
